page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF GUY
page.content: My name is Guy Simpson.I get up in the morning at 7.10a.m. I have a wash and watch Popeye on TVa.m. At 7.30 I get dressed and have some muslei breakfast cereal.I pop to the shop for a packet of crisps,pack my things,and leave for school at 8.35.On the way to school I have a chat with my step-brother Keith. After the bell we have assembly which is sometimes a bit boring but mostly its interesting.We do Ginn maths and then have dinner.I prefer tea to dinner,school dinners are horrible! There is too much salt in the mashed potato,the chips are soggy and the peas are watery.After dinner I play with my best friend Zuber.School finishes at 3.45. For tea I have egg,bacon and bread.Then I help Dad with the pigeons,watch some television and get ready for bed at 8.00 p.m.
